name: Lost in the Night (Aleshani)
description:
After three years with your wonderful family, you're now on your own.

But what happened? Where is your family? 

Try to figure it out by finding your five memories into the forest.

Maybe it's just a nightmare? Or maybe an infinite story that you cannot escape... Let's see!

Controls : 

WASD / Arrows : Move
Space : Jump
Left Shift : Run
F : Bark
